entry.title: West Virginia Jail Deaths Under Investigation
entry.content: Former officers report understaffing, overcrowded cells and broken locks. State lawmakers have acknowledged a corrections staffing and maintenance crisis.

entry.title: Colombian Children Survived on Fruit, Nuts and Wits After Crash in Amazon Jungle
entry.content: After escaping the wreckage of a plane crash that killed their mother, four children wandered for a month, suffering from malnourishment and dehydration before being found.
